Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a device that uses string and cups to communicate sound over a distance.
The student can show the device sending and receiving information over a distance using sound.
The student can represent how the string telephone demonstrates a solution to the problem of communicating over long distances.
The student can incorporate features in the drawing that demonstrate how people rely on technology, like a string telephone, to communicate.
The student can depict how the communication device must use only light or sound as a means of sending the message.
